sections.purpose: To maintain experimental animals according to ethical and regulatory standards.
sections.scope: Applicable to the entire animal housing and care system.
procedure: Provide autoclaved feed and chlorinated water ad libitum.
Change bedding weekly or more frequently if soiled.
Conduct daily health observations by trained personnel.
Maintain detailed records of animal receipt, health, and disposal.
Perform quarterly fumigation and pest control.
precautions: Restrict access to authorized personnel only.
Follow strict quarantine procedures for new arrivals.
Use HEPA-filtered air in barrier facilities.
Maintain backup power for critical systems.
